sourcesContent:
import Vue from 'vue'
import VueRouter from 'vue-router'
import Home from './views/Home.vue'
import FiveDayForecast from './views/FiveDayForecast.vue'
import SavedLocations from './views/SavedLocations.vue'
import HourlyForecast from './views/HourlyForecast.vue'

Vue.use(VueRouter)

const routes = [
  { 
    path: '/forecast/:location', 
    name: 'FiveDayForecast', 
    component: FiveDayForecast,
    props: true 
  },
  { 
    path: '/saved-locations', 
    name: 'SavedLocations', 
    component: SavedLocations 
  },
  { 
    path: '/hourly/:location', 
    name: 'HourlyForecast', 
    component: HourlyForecast,
    props: true 
  }
]

const router = new VueRouter({
  mode: 'history',
  base: process.env.BASE_URL,
  routes
})

export default router
